Title: Permits Congregation Kollel Tiferes Zvi to file an application for a real property tax exemption
Summary: Permits Congregation Kollel Tiferes Zvi to file an application for a real property tax exemption with respect to the tax years 2009-2010, 2010-2011, 2011-2012, 2012-2013, 2013-2014, 2014-2015, 2015-2016, 2016-2017, 2017-2018, 2018-2019 and 2019-2020.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to permitting Congregation Kollel Tiferes Zvi to file an application for a real property tax exemption
